maqras.text: 26|52|Ware wa mūsā ni,`waga shimo be-tachi to issho ni, yoru no ma ni tabidate. Anata gata wa kanarazu otte ga kakarudearou.' To keiji shita.
26|53|Sonotoki firuaun wa, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni tsukawashi,
26|54|(iwa seta) `korera no mono wa, hon'no shōsū no mure ni suginai nodesu.
26|55|Kare-ra wa, watashi-tachi ni hara o tatete irudeshouga,
26|56|watashi-tachi wa, keikai o totonoe, gunzei mo ōi nodesu.'
26|57|Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o kaju-en ya izumi kara oidashi,
26|58|zaihō ya eiyo aru chii kara tsuihō shita.
26|59|Son'na shidaideatta. Soshite ware wa Isuraeru no shison-tachi ni, korera no mono o (soto no tokoro de) tsuga seta.
26|60|Sate kare-ra (firuaun no gunzei) wa hinode no toki, kare-ra o otte kita.
26|61|Ryōsha ga tagaini sugata ga mieru yō ni naru to, mūsā no nakama wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, kanarazu oitsuka rerudearou.'
26|62|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Kesshite, kesshite. Hontōni omo wa watashi to tomoni ora remasu. Sugu ni onmichibiki ga arudeshou.'
26|63|Sonotoki, ware wa mūsā ni keiji shita. `Anata no tsue de umi o ute.' Suruto sore wa wakaretaga, sorezore no wareta bubun wa kyodaina yama no yōdeatta.
26|64|Ware wa mata,-gai no gun o soko ni obiki konda.
26|65|Soshite ware wa, mūsā soshite kare to tomoni ita hitobito subete o sukutta.
26|66|Daga hoka no mono-tachi o, obore saseta.
26|67|Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|68|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
26|69|Iburāhīmu no monogatari o kare-ra ni katari nasai.
26|70|Kare ga chichioya to kare no hitobito ni mukatte,`anata gata wa nani o sūhai suru nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
26|71|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa gūzō o sūhai shi, itsumo kore ni tsukaeru nodesu.'
26|72|Kare wa itta. `Anata gata ga inoru toki kare-ra (gūzō) wa kiku no ka.
26|73|Mata kare-ra (gūzō) wa, anata gata o ekisuru nodesu ka, soretomo gaisuru nodesu ka.'
26|74|Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi no sosen ga, kōshite iru no o mita nodesu.'
26|75|Kare wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, anata gataga ima made sūhai shite kita mono ni tsuite kangaete mita nodesu ka.
26|76|Anata gata mo, mukashi no sosen-tachi mo (sūhai shite ita mono ni tsuite).
26|77|Ban'yū no omo o nozoite wa, kare-ra wa watashi no tekidesu.
26|78|Kare wa watashi o tsukura reta kata de, watashi o michibika re,
26|79|watashi ni shokuryō o shikyū shi, mata inryō o sadzuke rareta okata.
26|80|Mata byōki ni nareba, kare wa watashi o iyashite kudasaimasu.
26|81|Watashi o shina se, sorekara ikikaera se rareru okata.
26|82|Shinpan no hi ni wa, zaika o o yurushi kudasa reru yō, watashi ga negai nozomu katadearu.
26|83|Omo yo, eichi o watashi ni sazuke, tadashī-sha-tachi no nakama ni irete kudasai.
26|84|Watashi o atoato no yo made shinjitsu o tsutaeta mono to shite kudasai.
26|85|Watashi o shifuku no en o tsugu mono ni nasa re,
26|86|watashi no chichi o o yurushi kudasai. Hontōni kare wa mayotta mono no nakamadesuga.
26|87|Mata (hitobito ga) fukkatsu sa se rareru hi ni, watashi no menboku o ushinawa senaide kudasai.
26|88|Sonohi ni wa, zaihō mo musuko-tachi mo, yakudachimasen.
26|89|Tada yogore no nai kokoro o, arrā ni bō-geru mono dake wa betsudesuga.'
26|90|Rakuen wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni chikadzuke rare,
26|91|jadō ni mayotta mono ni wa, hi goku ga arawareyou.
26|92|Soshite kare-ra wa iwa reyou. `Anata gataga, agamete ita (kamigami) wa doko ni iru nodesu ka.
26|93|Arrā o soto ni shite (hai shite ita mono) wa anata gata o tasuke rareru nodesu ka, matawa jibun jishin o tasuke rareru nodesu ka.'
26|94|Sokode kare-ra mo yūwaku shita-sha-tachi mo, sono naka ni nagekoma reru.
26|95|Mata iburīsu (akuma) no gunzei mo zenbu issho ni.
26|96|Kare-ra wa soko de, kōron shite iudearou.
26|97|`Arrā ni chikatte iimasu. Watashi-tachi wa akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodesu.
26|98|Ban'yū no omo to dōi ni, anata gata o hai shita nodesukara.
26|99|Watashi-tachi o mayowa seta no wa, tsumibukaimono-tachi nihokanaranai.
26|100|Sorede watashi-tachi ni wa, dare mo torinasu mono mo naku,
26|101|hitori no shin no tomo mo nai nodesu.
26|102|Watashi-tachi ga mōichido kaeru koto ga dekirunara, hontōni shinja no nakama ni hairu nodesuga.'
26|103|Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|104|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
26|105|Nūfu no min mo, shito-tachi o shinjinakatta.
26|106|Kare-ra no dōhō no nūfu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa,-nushi o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|107|Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|108|Sore de arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|109|Watashi wa, sore ni taishi anata gata ni hōshū o motomemasen. Watashi e no hōshū wa, tada ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|110|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.'
